tuv.seg: Employment law gives employees various entitlements to leave from work ranging from holidays to parental leave
Soláthraíonn an dlí fostaíochta teidlíochtaí áirithe saoirí ón obair d'fhostaithe ó laethanta saoire go dtí saoire do thuismitheoirí
Find out how your leave is calculated
Faigh amach conas do shaoire a ríomh
Sick leave and sick pay
Saoire bhreoiteachta agus pá breoiteachta
Your entitlement to paid sick leave from employment will depend on your contract of employment
Tá do theidlíocht saoire le pá ó fhostaíocht ag brath ar do chonradh fostaíochta
Other types of leave from work
Saoire eile ó fhostaíocht
The law gives an employee a limited right to leave from work in time of family crisis (force majeure)
Tá ceart dleathach teoranta ag fostaithe a gcuid oibre a fhágáil ar feadh tréimhse, an fhaid is atá géarchéim clainne ar siúl
Find out about compassionate leave, jury service and career breaks
Faigh eolas anseo ar shaoire trua agus ar chonas iarratas a dhéanamh
This gives a list of the nine public holidays and describes employees' entitlement to paid time off for these
Liosta de na 9 gcinn de laethanta saoire phoiblí. Bíonn tromlach na bhfostaithe i dteideal saoire le pá ar na laethanta saoire phoiblí
The Parental Leave Act 1998 as amended by the Parental Leave (Amendment) Act 2006 allows parents to take parental leave in respect of certain children
Ceadaíonn an tAcht um Shaoire do Thuismitheoirí 1998, agus é leasaithe ag an Acht um Shaoire do Thuismitheoirí (Leasú) 2006, saoire tuismitheora do thuismitheoirí i leith leanaí áirithe a fháil
The Carers Leave Act 2001 allows employees to take unpaid time off work to provide full-time care for people that require this care

Tugann An tAcht um Shaoire Cúramóra, 2001 cead d'fhostaithe saoire a ghlacadh ón obair gan íocaíocht ionas go mbeidh ar a gcumas cúram lánaimseartha a thabhairt do dhaoine a bhfuil an cúram seo de dhíth orthu
All female employees are entitled to maternity leave from work immediately before and after the birth of their child
Tá fostaithe mná i dteideal saoire mháithreachais, roimh agus i ndiaidh breithe a leanbh. Sonraí breise ar fáil anseo
People who adopt children may be entitled to leave from employment
Is féidir le daoine a uchtaíonn leanaí, saoire oibre a thógáil
This leave is called adoptive leave
Tugtar saoire uchtaíoch ar seo. Cad is brí le seo?
Find out what this means and how to apply
Agus conas is féidir leat iarratas a chur isteach ar shaoire uchtaíoch?
Information about statutory paternity leave, which is available from September 2016
Faisnéis faoi shaoire atharthachta reachtúil a bheidh ar fáil d’aithreacha nua ó Mheán Fómhair 2016
